title: Peaches - #1 Stewed Peaches
method: Use your own method regards the amount of water and sugar you use.
Iâ€™ve tweaked it a bit by gently simmering the fruit until just softened, then removing the fruit and adding 1/2 cup caster sugar, a couple of thin slices fresh ginger and a slurp of verjuice.
Bring the liquid back to the boil, then pour over the fruit and let cool.
The ginger and verjuice is very subtle.
